text:
Located very close to Punggol Point PW3 LRat station.
Can take bus 84 from PW3, 2 bus stops.
Lovely place to go with kids.
Got few kids swings, bycycle rental shop, lot of eateries, and more
Connecting to Coney island west Entrance.
Note that Coney island entry closes at 7 PM.
Overall good place for outing
A quiet station with not much foot traffic as the surrounding area are mostly still under development. It's a 20 min walk to nearby Punggol settlement
One of the worse LRT that Singapore have. East and west side loop sign are unclear. Don't know who give the approval for such design. Wasting passenger time

This must be a very convenient station as itâ€™s near to jetty! Nice view and itâ€™s a good investment for the future!:)

very close to the sea overlooking port of johor and to the left there is a country club and in front of the punggol point lrt are landed properties, further down are safra punggol and punggol waterway.
